bug.author: mlinxiang
bug.summary: i have follow warning or error log at each train epoch end, why?

comments.comment: ops that is a bug because ConfigProto can't be saved into the model file, I will patch it.
you can reinstall tflearn, it should works fine!

I'm seeing this issue after my final training step. <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3966170/16997540/ec415158-4e83-11e6-80c9-1724e0ef7add.png></denchmark-link>
